feedback.name: Raj Kumar
feedback.message: Love the selection of books at BookByte! The interface is user-friendly and the dark mode is easy on the eyes.

feedback.name: Priya Singh
feedback.message: I appreciate the detailed descriptions of each book. It helps me make informed decisions before purchasing.

feedback.name: Aditya Patel
feedback.message: The checkout process is smooth. However, it would be nice to have more payment options in the future.
